short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copying Cookies, LocalStorage, SessionStorage from One Website to Another Website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The original function was to copy the token of one website under another website.
But now it is no longer limited to copying token, it can copy cookie, localStorage, and sessionStorage under the Source Site to the Target Site.
If the Field is not empty, only one of the fields is copied, otherwise all of them are copied.
Click Value can copy it to the clipboard.
Github: https://github.com/Vgbire/tokencv
